Class EntityStalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • EntityStalker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EntityStalker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class used to produce statistics in a text representation for an entity.
    This class is used for the Statistics glass panel tool of the Simulation Screen class.
    Author:
    Jiayin Huang, Sally Hui, Tony Cui
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
